summary: A photographer is asked by hotel owners to take portraits of their recently deceased daughter.
cast: Pilar López de Ayala|Filipe Vargas|Isabel Ruth|Sara Carinhas|Ricardo Trêpa|Leonor Silveira|Ana Maria Magalhães|Luís Miguel Cintra|Adelaide Teixeira|Carmen Santos|José Manuel Mendes|Paulo Matos|Ricardo Aibéo|Sofia de Portugal|Daniela Costa|Susana Sá|António Reis|Maria Marques Gomes|Afonso Bonito|Susana Figueiredo|Maria Luísa Maia Pinto|José Carlos Coutinho|Sónia Botelho|Luís Machado|Andreia Vasconcelos
title: El extraño caso de Angélica
